subject: Deaths (Obituaries)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Lumpe, who was signed by the same scout who signed Mickey Mantle, made his Yankee debut in 1956 and went on to be an All-Star second baseman for the Tigers.
snippet: Lumpe, who was signed by the same scout who signed Mickey Mantle, made his Yankee debut in 1956 and went on to be an All-Star second baseman for the Tigers.
